name: scratch.exe (KeithV2)
description:
this game took months to make so uh yeah. click on the light in the first room to start the game. you can travel through the vents to get to other areas. the scratch cat has a chance at popping up keep an eye out for him. by the way you have to stay in your inventory to use the hammer on the door. there's a 10% chance the medkit will popup in the safe house.

sonic.exe was my inspiration

Features -

menu has static effects

Blood when low health effect

inventory

voice acting

healing system

working items

hiding system

fun system (/deppresion system)

unlockable areas

working escape door

hidden stuff

dark effect when fun is low
